channel.title: Menus on The Radnor Arms
channel.description: Recent content in Menus on The Radnor Arms

item.title: All-Day
item.description: All-Day Menu Appetisers Homemade Soup(s) - Starter: £5 / Main: £7 Served with rustic bread and butter. Check for todays' choice(s). Breaded Garlic Mushrooms (V) - £5 Served with salad garnish and homemade garlic dip. Breaded Whitebait - £6 Served with a salad garnish and garlic mayonnaise. Halloumi Fries (V) - £6 Served with a salad garnish and sweet chilli dips. Two Filled Potato Long Boats - £6 Choice of “bacon & cheese”, “tuna & cheese” or “cheese & peppers”(V) served on a bed of salad.

item.title: Artisans & Jackets
item.description: Artisans & Jackets Usually available at lunchtime only Choice of Artisan Bread or Jacket Potato, served with salad garnish. Choice of fillings: Tuna Mayonnaise - £8 Cheese & Coleslaw - £7 Sausage & Bacon (Artisan Bread Only) - £7 Bacon and Cheese (Cheddar or Brie) - £8 Baked Beans & Cheddar Cheese (Jacket Only) - £7 **For allergy information please ask a Manager. Also, please note nuts and peanuts are used in our kitchen.

item.title: The Pub Board
item.description:
The Pub Board Menu Limited socks available daily
Handmade Pie & Mash - £13 Steak & Ale, served with homemade gravy. Rack of Ribs & Homemade BBQ Sauce - £16 Served with chips (or jacket), corn-on-cob, onion rings, salad (or peas) and homemade coleslaw. Lamb Shank, Mash & Homemade Mint Gravy - £16 Served with vegetables. 10 oz Rump or 8 oz Sirloin Stake - £17 Served with chips (or jacket), onion rings, salad (or peas) and homemade coleslaw.

item.title: Garden & Bar Snacks
item.description: Garden & Bar Snacks These menu choices are only served in the outside garden area and in the bar, they are not available in the main dining area. Skins, Wings & Fins - £13 3 Long boat potato skins filled with either: bacon & cheese, tuna & cheese, or cheese & peppers, spicy chicken wings, and freshly battered cod goujons. Chicken and Chips - £6.95 Four on-the-bone chicken. Freshly Battered Cod Goujons and Chips - £7.

item.title: Weekday Takeaway
item.description: Weekday Takeaway Menu The takeaway service is only from 5.30pm - 7.00pm Chips £3.00 Battered Cod £8.00 Radnor Fishcake £6.00 Scampi £7.00 Bacon Double Cheese Burger £7.00 Beef Burger £3.00 Cheese Burger £3.50 Southern Chicken Burger (1) £5.00 Southern Chicken Bacon/Cheese Burger £7.00 Spicy Bean Burger(v/gf) £6.

item.title: Sunday Lunch
item.description: Sunday Menu Starters Homemade Soup - Starter: £5 / Main: £7 Served with rustic bread and butter. Please ask at the Bar for the choice(s). Breaded Garlic Mushrooms (V) - £5 Served with salad garnish and homemade garlic dip. Filled Potato Long Boats - £6 Choice of “Bacon and Cheese”, “tuna and cheese” or “Roast Peppers and Cheese” (V) served on a bed of salad. Breaded Whitebait (GF) - £6 Served with a salad garnish and garlic mayonnaise.

item.title: Sunday Takeaway
item.description: Sunday Takeaway Menu The takeaway service is from 12pm - 12.30pm and 2pm - 2.30pm (orders must be made by 2pm Saturday) Roasts Half Roast Chicken (on the bone) £12.00 Roast Beef £13.00 Roast Lamb £13.50 Pumpkin, Mushroom & Chestnut Roast (v/gf) £10.50 Mushroom, Brie,Hazelnut & Cranberry Wellington £13.50 All Sunday Roasts come with roast potatoes, roast parsnips, homemade Yorkshire Pudding, sage & onion stuffing, cauliflower cheese, and a selection of vegetables.
